name: Polka Classic
public_notice: Polka Classic (DOTC) has recently migrated from their old contract to new one . For more information, please view this announcement on Twitter.

description.en: Polka Classic Coin is a platform for the future of funding that is built on top of the BSC  blockchain. Two simple functions occur during each trade: LP Acquisition, and Burn.
